line.token: * This file is part of the Symfony package.
* For the full copyright and license information, please view the LICENSE
* file that was distributed with this source code.
* The Progress class provides helpers to display progress output.
* @deprecated since version 2.5, to be removed in 3.0
* Start time of the progress bar.
* Stored format part widths (used for padding).
' class is deprecated since version 2.5 and will be removed in 3.0. Use the Symfony\Component\Console\Helper\ProgressBar class instead.'
// Disabling output when it does not support ANSI codes as it would result in a broken display anyway.
* Advances the progress output X steps.
* @param int $step Number of steps to advance
* @param bool $redraw Whether to redraw or not
* @param bool $redraw Whether to redraw or not
'You must start the progress bar before calling setCurrent().'
'You must start the progress bar before calling display().'
* Removes the progress bar from the current line.
* This is useful if you wish to write some output
* while a progress bar is running.
* Call display() to show the progress bar again.
'You must start the progress bar before calling finish().'
* Generates the array map of format variables to values.
* @return array Array of format vars and values
* Overwrites a previous message to the output.
// append whitespace to match the last line's length
